messages.subject: Re: TodayShow.com traveling homeschooler interview
messages.msgSnippet: I discovered this series last night. It feels much different than other recent media coverage. Andrea Q
messages.messageBody:
I discovered this series last night. It feels much different than other recent media coverage.

Andrea Q

messages.subject: TodayShow.com traveling homeschooler interview
messages.msgSnippet: This came out today, as part of their weeklong series on homeschooling. We re included in the interviews:
messages.messageBody:
This came out today, as part of their weeklong series on homeschooling.
We're included in the interviews:
http://today.msnbc.msn.com/id/39328391/ns/today-parenting/

I'm really pleasantly surprised by how positive the whole thing is.


--
~~L!

s/v Excellent Adventure
http://www.theexcellentadventure.com/

"I can’t understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I’m frightened
of the old ones."
~~John Cage


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
